entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having a broad grin on his face and feeling full after breakfast.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is told off by Harry and has an astonished look on his face.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, described as sitting in her cage with enormous amber eyes and clicking her beak to show annoyance.

entities.name: the letter
entities.description: A letter dropped by the small owl at Harry's feet.

relationships.description: Harry tells off Dudley, who has an astonished look on his face.
Hedwig is Harry's owl and is sitting in her cage in his bedroom.
